column1: 7111,"Clay, Concrete, Glass and Stone Processing Machine Operators",,"Measure dimensions of completed products or work pieces to verify conformance to specifications
column3: Remove products or work pieces from production equipment
column11: Inspect finishes of work pieces or finished products
column13: Package products for storage or shipment
column15: Adjust equipment controls to regulate flow of production
column19: Read work orders or other instructions to determine product specifications or materials requirements
column25: Set equipment controls to meet cutting specifications
column27: Collect samples of materials or products for testing
column29: Monitor equipment operation to ensure proper functioning
column33: Manoeuvre work pieces in equipment during production
column35: Position raw materials on processing or production equipment
column39: Conduct test runs of production equipment
column43: Mix ingredients to create specific finishes
column45: Load items into ovens or furnaces
column47: Maintain inventories of materials, equipment or products
